text: Logo! Apnay rab say daro aur uss din ka khof kero jiss din baapo apnay betay ko koi nafa na phoncha sakay ga aur na beta apnay baap ka zara sa bhi nafa kerney wala hoga (yaad rakho) Allah ka wada sacha hai (dekho) tumehn duniya ki zindagi dhokay mein na dalay aur na dhokay baaz (shetan) tumehn dhokay mein daal dey
